name: Wizard
description: Masters of arcane magic who study the fundamental forces of the universe, harnessing powerful spells through rigorous study and precise incantations.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Magical energy that powers spellcasting and arcane abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per 6 seconds, +5 when studying or meditating
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast spells and power magical abilities
Some spells require maintaining focus, consuming mana over time
Short rests restore a portion of maximum mana
Depleted mana causes penalties to spell effectiveness and casting speed
Can be temporarily boosted through magical artifacts or rituals
Successful spell research or magical discovery restores a portion of mana

resource_systems.name: Arcane Focus
resource_systems.description: Mental concentration and magical attunement that enhances spellcasting effectiveness
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when casting spells successfully, decreases when spells fail or are interrupted
mechanics: Increases by 10 when successfully casting complex spells or countering enemy magic
Increases by 5 per 10 seconds when maintaining concentration on ongoing spells
Decreases by 10 when spells are interrupted or countered
Decreases by 5 per minute when not actively using magic
Can be spent to enhance spell effects or execute special magical techniques
Higher Arcane Focus increases spell critical chance and reduces chance of magical mishaps

class_mechanics.name: Spellcasting
class_mechanics.description: Ability to cast arcane spells from a learned spellbook
effects: Can cast a variety of arcane spells with different effects and power levels
Able to prepare a limited number of spells each day from a larger spellbook
Can identify magical effects and properties through arcane knowledge
Presence naturally attunes to magical energies in the environment
Can counter or dispel magical effects through opposing arcane forces

class_mechanics.name: Arcane Knowledge
class_mechanics.description: Comprehensive understanding of magical theory and principles
effects: Can research and develop new spells through study and experimentation
Able to identify magical items and understand their properties
Can analyze magical phenomena and determine their causes and effects
Presence enhances the magical aptitude of allies
Can predict the behavior of magical forces and energies

class_mechanics.name: Magical Specialization
class_mechanics.description: Focus on specific schools of magic for enhanced effectiveness
effects: Can specialize in particular schools of magic for increased power
Able to cast specialized spells with greater efficiency and effect
Can develop unique magical techniques within chosen specializations
Presence strengthens environmental magic aligned with specializations
Can combine specialized knowledge for unique magical effects

class_mechanics.name: Arcane Manipulation
class_mechanics.description: Ability to directly manipulate magical energies and effects
effects: Can shape and direct magical energies with precise control
Able to modify spell effects on the fly for specific situations
Can absorb and redirect magical energies under certain conditions
Presence naturally stabilizes wild magic and chaotic magical effects
Can sense magical disturbances and anomalies in the surrounding area

skill_trees.name: Elemental Magic
skill_trees.focus: Mastery of spells that manipulate elemental forces
key_abilities: Elemental Mastery: Gain significant bonuses with chosen elemental spells
Elemental Attunement: Develop resistance to elemental damage types
Elemental Fusion: Combine multiple elements for enhanced spell effects

skill_trees.name: Arcane Theory
skill_trees.focus: Deep understanding of magical principles and research
key_abilities: Spell Research: Develop new spells through magical experimentation
Magical Analysis: Identify and understand complex magical phenomena
Arcane Efficiency: Reduce mana costs and increase spell effectiveness

skill_trees.name: Magical Control
skill_trees.focus: Precise manipulation and control of magical energies
key_abilities: Spell Shaping: Modify spell area and effects for tactical advantage
Counterspell Mastery: Effectively counter and dispel enemy magic
Magical Precision: Increase spell accuracy and reduce collateral effects

arch_classes.name: Evoker
arch_classes.description: Wizards who have specialized in channeling and manipulating raw magical energies, creating powerful effects that can both destroy and transform.

lore: Wizards represent the scholarly approach to magic, having dedicated their lives to understanding and mastering arcane forces through rigorous study and experimentation. Unlike the intuitive magic of sorcerers or the divine powers of clerics, wizards rely on accumulated knowledge, precise formulas, and theoretical understanding to shape magical energies to their will. Their training encompasses not just spellcasting but also magical theory, history, and research methodologies, making them versatile practitioners with a deep understanding of how magic functions. Many wizards begin their careers in magical academies or as apprentices to established mages, where they can develop their skills under experienced guidance. Others are self-taught scholars who pieced together magical knowledge from ancient texts and personal experimentation. Regardless of their background, all wizards share a thirst for magical knowledge and a methodical approach to expanding their arcane capabilities. In dangerous situations, wizards excel at analyzing magical threats and deploying precisely the right spell for each challenge, adapting their approach as circumstances change. Their ability to prepare different spells each day allows them to tailor their magical arsenal to anticipated challenges, making them incredibly versatile when given time to prepare. Though they may lack the physical resilience of more combat-focused classes, the sheer versatility and power of wizards' spellcasting makes them formidable allies whose contributions can completely transform challenging encounters through clever application of magical solutions.
